DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare effect three different non-pharmacological intervention ( usually practice ambulatory care Childhood Obesity ( AmO ) , physical activity program ( IFSP ) diet therapy adjust estimate indirect calorimetry ) percentage body fat basal metabolism child Overweight obesity metropolitan region Porto Alegre ( RS ) .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Three Non-drug Intervention Treatment Children With Overweight
DOC.criteria: age 8 15 year old overweight ( Zscore BMI +1 e +2 ) obesity ( Zscore BMI > +2 ) chronic disease
